rules: ԍGems

rules: ԍJewelry

rules: ԍPearls

title: Greed
rules: ԍTrinkets

name: GreedHate
title: Get Shot!
rules: The game ends now

name: GreedApathy
title: Get Shot!
rules: The game ends after this round

name: GreedLike
title: Don't get shot?
rules: The game ends now

name: Admire
title: Admire
rule1of3: If there is only 1 worker on this card, Gain 2 treasures
rule2of3: If there is only 1 worker on this card, Swap 2 treasures
rule3of3: If there is only 1 worker on this card, Lose 2 treasures

name: Bribe
title: Bribe
rules: Lose a coin, Gain a treasure

name: Cajole
title: Cajole
rule1of3: Swap a treasure for a coin

name: Decieve
title: Decieve
rules: Take a treasure from a player. Give them a treasure.

name: Entertain
title: Entertain
rules: Gain 1 treasure per worker already on this card

name: Flirt
title: Flirt
rule2of2: Trade a treasure with another player.

name: Gripe
title: Gripe
rule1of3: Lose a coin, Gain a treasure
rule2of3: Lose a coin, Swap a treasure
rule3of3: Lose a coin, Lose a treasure

name: Hoodwink
title: Hoodwink
rule1of3: Gain a coin, Gain a treasure
rule2of3: Gain a coin, Swap a treasure
rule3of3: Gain a coin, Lose a treasure

name: Kowtow
title: Kowtow
rules: Lose 1 or 3 treasures

name: Lie
title: Lie
rules: Add or Remove a Captain meeple then take another turn

name: Menace
title: Menace
rules: Take a treasure from another player

name: Negotiate
title: Negotiate
rules: Trade a treasure with another player

name: Quibble
title: Quibble
rules: Swap a treasure with the Captain

name: Rage
title: Rage
rules: Lose 2 coins per empty slot on this card

name: Steal
title: Steal
rules: Take a coin from another player

name: Trick
title: Trick
rules: Take a treasure from another player. Give that player a coin

name: Whine
title: Whine
rule1of3: Move a Captain meeple, Lose a treasure
rule3of3: Move a Captain meeple, Lose 2 treasures

name: Yell
title: Yell
rule1of3: Add a Captain meeple, Lose a treasure
rule2of3: Add a Captain meeple, Swap a treasure
rule3of3: Add a Captain meeple, Gain a treasure

name: c1
rules: When you Gain a treasure, you may pay a player 2 coins to Gain it from that player instead of the Captain.
title: Trevyn

name: c2
rules: When you Gain coins, Gain an extra coin.
title: Sophia

name: c3
rules: When the game ends, Gain an extra treasure from the Captain's hoard.
title: Andrew

name: c5
rules: When you swap treasures you may swap 2 instead of 1.
title: Erin

name: c9
rules: You may pay 3 coins to change which of the revealed Greeds are the active Greed.
title: Dan

name: c11
rules: If you have the most coins at the end of the game, gain 5 extra points.
title: James

name: c12
rules: When you swap a treasure, you may pay a player 1 coin to swap a treasure with that player instead of the Captain.
title: Taylor

name: c15
rules: If you have no coins, you may Gain a coin as part of any action.
title: Berrett

name: c17
rules: When you count treasures for the purpose of determining who gets shot, you are treated as having 2 fewer treasures.
title: Dwayne

name: c19
rules: Your gold coins are worth 1 extra point each at the end of the game.
title: Isabella
